content.question:
The following is a residual plot from a regression of a variable with the independent variable <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Based on the plot, is it reasonable to conclude that a linear model is appropriate?

choices.label: Yes, because the plot shows no apparent pattern.
Yes, because the points in the plot display less variation as <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> increases.
Yes, because the sum of the residuals is close to zero.
No, because the plot shows no apparent pattern.
No, because the points in the plot display more variation as <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> increases.

content.answer: Yes, because the plot shows no apparent pattern.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
